comments:
An invalid extension caused the NavigatorContentDescriptor descriptor to be null, resulting in an NPE in NavigatorActivationService, which ultimately prevented Project Explorer view altogether from being created. I realize that there is a problem with the extension but the framework should be robust enough in this case to log an error and continue with other providers.

Exception msg:
Unable to create view ID org.eclipse.ui.navigator.ProjectExplorer: An unexpected exception was thrown.

Stack trace:
